channel.title: What is Client.Java and where is it $$Cash Reward$$
channel.description:
This is probably a noobish question, but sorry i have a very dificult time learning new coding and programing when i already have learned flash, html, css, javascript, php and more i cant seem to find the file called client.java as a matter of fact i cant find any .java files from moparscape, i was wondering if:
a) The client.java file is a seperate download b) client.java is a code word for a different file c) what does the client.java file do?
[size=14pt] Anyone who helps me will get 5$ via paypal![/size]

item.title: What is Client.Java and where is it $$Cash Reward$$
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

ok first off
1:client java comes with a server source (e.x testscape) and it says client it is a notepad but it says java file under it
2:client.java comes in all server sources
3:client java basiscally holds your whole server source together and you use it to add in commands and other things which can be found in the tut section on this site

hope i could help…now weres my reward? lol

Read full topic

item.title: What is Client.Java and where is it $$Cash Reward$$
item.dc:creator: @_8ballcrazy ~8ballcrazy~
item.description:
@_8ballcrazy wrote:

i dont even want a reward…ok download a server
look for it in docs or in desktop
then right click it then click extract here
then look in docs or desktop again for a folder of the name of youre server
go in it then you should see
client
java
or client.java
